item.title: Dato' Joey Yap provides insights on the metal rat year
item.description:
Thriving in the Year of the Metal Rat: A Guide by Dato’ Joey Yap [Image of a golden rat with the caption “Year of the Metal Rat feng shui advice 2020”] Source: The Joey Yap Group. Dato’ Yap. Dato’ Joey Yap, renowned expert in Chinese Metaphysics and founder of the Mastery Academy of Chinese Metaphysics, has created a comprehensive guide for navigating the year of the rat. This resource, Everything About The Year of The Metal Rat 2020 All In One Place, is available on his portal...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dato-joey-yap-provides-insights-on-the-metal-rat-year/

item.title: Dato' Joey Yap reveals video predictions for each Chinese zodiac animal for the year 2017
item.description:
Joey Yap, founder and CEO of the Mastery Academy of Chinese Metaphysics and Chief Consultant of the Joey Yap Consulting Group, created 12 videos outlining the year ahead for the 12 Chinese zodiac animal signs in areas such as career, relationships, business, and health. The videos are in English and include traditional Chinese subtitles. The year of the fire rooster starts on January 28, 2017. Yap considers the rooster one of the luckiest animals in 2017...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dato-joey-yap-reveals-video-predictions-for-each-chinese-zodiac-animal-for-the-year-2017/

item.title: Dato' Joey Yap reveals his forecasts for the Year of the Earth Boar, 2019
item.description:
Over 5,000 attendees were present at Dato’ Joey Yap’s yearly Feng Shui & Astrology seminar in January 2019. During the seminar, Dato’ Yap provided insights into the Year of the Earth Boar, covering both the year’s forecasts and the projected global economic climate. He specifically highlighted February 8th, 11th, and 12th as auspicious dates to resume work in 2019. A notable collaboration with EZ-Link resulted in the launch of special edition EZ-Link cards...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dato-joey-yap-reveals-his-forecasts-for-the-year-of-the-earth-boar-2019/
